messages.content: Text created/updated with CEFR level A2

Text saved: Many people in the city of Berlin were not happy. They did not like that people killed wild pigs with guns. They said it was not kind. Hunters and people who love animals argued a lot.

So, the city government decided to make a new plan. It was a kinder plan for the pigs. They stopped killing the pigs with guns. Instead, they put up fences. They also made a new rule. The rule says people cannot feed the pigs.

We do not know if this plan will work. It may be a difficult problem. This is because the winters are warmer now. So, there are more pigs than in the past.

Because people protested, the city government made a new plan. It was a more peaceful plan. They stopped killing the pigs with guns. Instead, they put up fences. They also made a new rule. The rule says people cannot feed the pigs.

We do not know if this new plan will work. The city may lose this fight. This is because the winters are warmer now. Warmer winters mean there are more pigs than before.

- Vocabulary Violation: The text uses the word 'peaceful', which is a B1 level word. This is an unacceptable deviation from the A2 standard.
